SELECT id, channel_code, channel_name, channel_type, config_key, config_value, config_type, config_desc, is_enabled, is_default, priority, is_deleted, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time FROM pay_channel_config
AND channel_code LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.channelCode}, '%')
AND channel_name LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.channelName}, '%')
AND channel_type LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.channelType}, '%')
AND config_type LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.configType}, '%')
AND is_enabled LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.isEnabled}, '%')
AND is_default LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.isDefault}, '%')
AND is_deleted LIKE CONCAT(#{queryParams.isDeleted}, '%')
